column7: Unit tests should be backported too!
column22: To ensure, backporting did not introduce bugs, unit tests should be backported too (where possible)

Currently its impossible to translate form.submit

<f:form.submit><f:translate key="lang_submit"/></f:form.submit>

This construct doesn't work. And in viewhelpertest is no matching example given. And no $this->renderChildren(); is given in SubmitViewHelper.php

column7: use interface for RenderingContext instead of concrete class
column22:
right now backporter adds 
$this->setRenderingContext($this->objectManager->create(\'Tx_Fluid_Core_Rendering_RenderingContext\'));
to TemplateView.php file. But should use 'Tx_Fluid_Core_Rendering_RenderingContextInterface'

Since TYPO3 4.7 the forceCharset configuration is deprecated. The class Tx_Fluid_Core_Compiler_AbstractCompiledTemplate
still uses the value of the localconf.php ($GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['BE']['forceCharset']).
This patch removes this handling and always set UTF-8 if no default charset is set.

Related to Extbase fluid issue: #37929

column7: Remove TOKENS replacement  for templates fallbacks
Synch fluid backporter with TYPO3 CMS 6.0 and Flow 1.1
column22: Fluid backported needs to be updated to reflect changes in CMS and Flow (e.g. namespaces)
Fluid backporter should be v1 and v2 compatible (based on the version switch).
